content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www theturtletrunk com the sweet tea tank is a quick and easy crochet tank top/ crop top pattern this features a v neck line and a beautifully textured fabric it s made up of two identical panels that are seamed at the shoulders and sides this top can be made cropped length full length or anywhere between difficulty easy standard us crochet terms instructions include - 9 sizes ranging from xs-5x - color coded sizes for clear readability - full instructions for both a crop length and full length - link to free video tutorial - gauge pattern sizes size - bust - yardage xs - 28-30 - 275 s - 32-34 - 300 m - 36-38 - 325 l - 40-42 - 375 xl - 44-46 - 425 2x - 48-50 - 500 3x - 52-54 - 550 4x - 56-58 - 600 5x - 60-62 - 650 supplies needed - medium 4 weight cotton yarn - 9mm m & 6mm j hook - yarn needle - scissors
